titleInfo.title: Letter, Annette Ramsey in Huntersville, N.C., to Elizabeth Ramsey Breck in Knoxville, Tenn. 1890 Mar. 27

mods.abstract: 1890 Mar. 27, Annette Ramsey, daughter of Robert Ramsey, Huntersville, N.C., to her aunt, Elizabeth Ramsey Breck, Knoxville, Tenn. Expresses appreciation for money sent by Lizzie and Mack. Reveals that the family has had a difficult time since her father became too ill to work. Discusses her studies and her plans to leave school and help her family financially.

subject.topic: Family -- Health and hygiene -- North Carolina -- Huntersville -- History -- 19th century.
Family -- Economic aspects -- North Carolina -- Huntersville -- History -- 19th century.
